original_text: ‘Son of man, sing this funeral song about the king of Tyre. Tell him, “This is what the Almighty Lord says: At one time, you were the example of a good man. You were completely wise and beautiful. ‘Son of man, sing this funeral song about the king of Tyre. Tell him, “This is what the Almighty Lord says:
korean_text: 인자야 두로 왕을 위하여 슬픈 노래를 지어 그에게 이르기를 주 여호와의 말씀에 너는 완전한 도장이었고 지혜가 충족하며 온전히 아름다웠도다

sentences.original_text: sing this funeral song about the king of Tyre
sentences.korean_translation: 두로 왕에 대한 이 장래의 노래를 불러라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says
you were the example of a good man
